main.java.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Controller. It's the class which controls the application, by changing its currentState depending on the actions of the user, with a set of methods the View can call.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Controller(CircuitManagement circuitManagement)
      Instantiates a new controller.
